investigation_outcome: Root cause: coating adhesion deficiency in lot PLT-2022-087; corrective action implemented via CAPA-001

harm_description: Stent edge dissection requiring additional stent
patient_outcome: Additional stent placed - good angiographic result
investigation_outcome: Device-related; stent edge dissection attributable to sizing and lesion characteristics; no design deficiency identified

patient_outcome: Stent retrieved percutaneously - no long-term sequelae

harm_description: Retained catheter fragment requiring percutaneous retrieval
